thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 4 of 10
thread.title: Kylie

author: Kylie
title: Kylie
text: I have travelled with Intrepid multiple times and they have some fantastic guides, who really give you the local flavour and are really passionate about their respective countries. You could probably travel for slightly cheaper if you were to organise it all yourself, but that's the whole point. They take away the hassle of logistics and schedules and language, so you can focus on absorbing the culture and having a good time.
